Text:
I too have been using LR4 for about 2 months of daily use. It eats up my macbook pro (2009) 2.53 Core 2 Duo on 8 gigs of ram. 

Ive finally decided its time to downgrade. Its annoying trying to edit over 600 photos with a VERY laggy lightroom.

Thanks for the Share.

User Type: I tested LR4 and it ate my system alive even my friends macbook pro was having issues with it...
